# Configuring a project for the very first time

```{r}
library(sarosverse)
project_full_title <- "DeltakerundersÃ¸kelsene"
project_initials <- "DU"

initialize_saros_project(path = project_path,

                         replacement_list = c("prosjekt_initialer" = project_initials),
```
